name: js-arrays-in-c
description: Implementation of Js Array in C using linked lists.

scripts.pretest: npm run posttest --quiet && mkdir ./temp/ && touch temp/test
scripts.test: gcc -o ./temp/test src/_main.test.c src/acessors.c src/array.c src/iterators.c src/mutators.c && ./temp/test

author: Marcel Coelho
